name: Blue Kaffee Improvements
description:
This style includes a few basic improvements and colour changes to Blue Kaffee:
  • Improves table spacing
  • Removes unnecessary post buttons (heart and superscript/subscript)
  • New, less harsh blue and orange colour scheme
There are a few issues:
  • Logo at the top of the forums is removed (was impossible to change the colours)
  • Top menu links revert to original colours on mouseover (cannot be prevented)
